description:
In this episode, see high school boys dub girls on the street, get picked on by older girls, pretend to get beaten up, catch up with old friends, remember childhood memories, and try to act cool.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Danshi Koukousei to Atereko / Danshi Koukousei to Nenkoujoretsu / Danshi Koukousei to Kyuuseishu / Danshi Koukousei to Kyuuyuu / Danshi Koukousei to Ijinden / Danshi Koukousei to Bungaku Shoujo 3 / Joshikousei wa Ijou "Enkon"

High School Boys and Dubbing / High School Boys and Seniority / High School Boys and Saviors / High School Boys and Old Friends / High School Boys and the Tale of a Great Man / High School Boys and Book-Loving Girls 3 / High School Girls Are Funky: Enmity
男子高校生とアテレコ / 男子高校生と年功序列 / 男子高校生と救世主 / 男子高校生と旧友 / 男子高校生と偉人伝 / 男子高校生と文学少女3 / 女子高生は異常「怨恨」
